mapper.select: SELECT B.RN, B.FNO, B.WRITER, B.CONTENT, B.IP, B.HIT, B.CREATED, B.LASTMODIFIED, B.STATE, B.DEPTH, B.GROUPNO, B.GROUPORD FROM (SELECT ROWNUM AS RN, A.FNO, A.WRITER, A.CONTENT, A.IP, A.HIT, A.CREATED, A.LASTMODIFIED, A.STATE, A.DEPTH, A.GROUPNO, A.GROUPORD FROM (SELECT FNO, WRITER, CONTENT, IP, HIT, CREATED, LASTMODIFIED, STATE, DEPTH, GROUPNO, GROUPORD FROM FREE ORDER BY GROUPNO DESC, GROUPORD ASC) A ) B WHERE B.RN BETWEEN #{beginRecord} and #{endRecord}
